text: Bomarea ceratophora is a species of flowering plant in the family Alstroemeriaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador, where it is known from only two collections.Mogollón, H. and N. Pitman. 2003. Bomarea ceratophora. In: IUCN 2012. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2012.2. Downloaded on 01 July 2013. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador ceratophora Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Bomarea ceratophora
